meanings.sent5: The pesty raindrops fell steadily, dampening our spirits.

meanings.definition: Characterized by persistent annoyance or irritation
meanings.sent1: The pesty weeds in the garden kept growing back no matter how many times we pulled them.
meanings.sent2: The pesty customer complained about every little detail of the product.
meanings.sent3: The pesty computer virus kept popping up unwanted ads on the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her pesty cough during the concert disrupted the entire performance.
meanings.sent5: The pesty traffic jam made everyone late for work.
